crap....double crap

Give me a break!!!! I would love to just move out right now and everything would be perfect! I'm so ready to get out. I'd be free. I was talking to my friend amber, and we decided that were going to go and get an apartment, cause we both need to get out, and anyways her mom charges her rent already...$150 a month, that sucks. I just want to be on my own and not have to hear everyone tell me what i need to do. I can make my own decisions and live my life how i want to. I just need to finish school and then everything else will follow...yeah thats it. ------------ More --------------- Well last night went to my friend hillarys house and watched some wrestling and some clone high...that show is awesome, they were talking about a.d.d. and a.d.h.d. a.d.d.'s hyperactive cousin its a funny show, tom green was on the show too. ------------ Yes you need to read more ------------ I want to go to boston again or out to california, i could live in boston and be very happy. its really cool out there, tons of stuff to do. I think next year i'm going to plan a trip out to boston with some friends...maybe i wont come back. well thats all for now...till later.

I wish i knew how to make some of my friends realize how to make things better. It makes me soo mad sometimes that i cant do anything to make things better. There is way to many things going on between our group of friends, and its scareing some people i think. What to do what to do??

small song i wrote during class: Verse 1 Pre-Chorus Chorus Verse 2 Pre-Chorus Hook Chorus Pre-Chorus Chorus End Friday...shes mine Verse 1: Yesterday i called my friend goin to the show later he said so i picked my ass up off the floor and got ready to go Put my hat on and deordant spray gonna hit on some hot girls today maybe i will get lucky tonight.... pre chorus: Do you really wanna go my way? gonna hit the floor and i'm ready to play gonna turn this shit around and make it my way chorus: its just another friday so you say i wonder what she's gonna say cause today is gonna be when i do things my way..... Verse 2: Gonna do this no turnin back heard my name called behind your best friends back cause i'm not gonna sit around here all day I got your girlfriend so how is that its not my problem only yours now jack so how do you feel about that now? Chorus... Hook: Wonder how you'll get through this one never has it been like this understand this on thing man or you'll just miss the point.... chorus, pre-chorus, chorus...end

Hmmm no responses...a friend told me that love will smack you in the face when your not looking for it. Maybe, but how long has it been since i've last been in a relationship??? 5 years maybe...yeah this isnt fun...here is something just off the top of my head. sitting here alone with no one to talk to i dont understand why i must go through this when time seems to drag on people say just to have patience how can i when its been to long stuggling to hold on to what i feel i need, without you standing by my side is what i really need Where have you gone? what do you need? understanding nothing, in my parallel dream How can i understand? when i've been hurt by you nothing more i need, than just to be with you Slower the days go bye more melodic and wavering like the tides moon shines bright above your gaze does hold love Where do i go from here? should i tread on? when everything seems hopeless where do i belong?
Put a comments system in...see if it works

Some people are just stupid or not smart...I worked for this guy and he sent me my tax stuff...well he put the information in the wrong spot and wont change it to how it should be. Even the I.R.S. told me that he needs to change it. Well he'll get a nice letter from them in the mail in about a week. Hope he doesnt get to upset, he could of fixed it pretty easily.
Welcome to my new blog...xanga was cool, but i have much more control over this one. :)

Where do i start??? Yesterday was valentines day. This usually was the one day out of the year where i knew that i'd be by myself. Well not this year. It was the BEST day/date i've ever had. Its also the longest date i've every been on....about 12 hours long. First of all it started off by me going to go and pick her up at her place. She got me a card and fun dip. The card she gave me was perfect, and the fun dip, hey who doesnt like fun dip? Well after that i took her to our first place we were going to go to. I didnt tell her what we were going to do, but i did tell her where we were going. I wanted it to be a surprise. We went to Kensington Metropark, to go and feed the birds from out of your hand....its very cool, we had a really good time doing that. We decided then to go walk the trail a bit, and then something happened that maked the date even better....we came across about 9 deer, that were only about 10 feet away from us...it was really cool...we were holding hands by then and just watching the deer and what they were going to do. The baby deers started to follow us, which was also cool...we had a really good time at kensington. The second place we went to was to go and eat....i really didnt have an idea on where we were going to go, but there was a place in livonia that i wanted to go to and try, and she said she was up for anything. We went to Buca di Peppo. Its an italian resturant where they serve family size portions. We got this shrimp pasta stuff, it was good, but there was a ton of food....we could only eat one serving and we were both full...sooo we left. The third place that we went to was just a place for us to talk...so we went to the Coffee Bean Coffee House in Plymouth. I think we got there around 5 and we didnt leave till 9:30...we talked about everything. It was great. Never did we have a pause in conversation....which when you usually talk to someone for 4.5 hours, there usually are points when you cant think of anything to say...that just didnt happen. But the day/date wasnt over... The fourth and final thing we did was we went to go see the movie "How to lose a guy in 10 days". It was a really good movie, its not quite a girl movie and its not quite a guy movie...I enjoyed it and i know she did too...we were the last two people to leave the inside of the theater, cause we really didnt feel like in any kind of a rush. It was late by then so i decided to take her home. We took the long way back so we could still talk some more....i've never been this comfortable talking to anyone for this long....when we got back to her place i walked her to her door, gave her a hug goodnight...i wanted to give her a kiss goodnight, but i want things to go smoothly between us, so we'll know when it feels right (although it did last night). I cant say that i have have'd a better time than i did yesterday. I know that i wont be able to spend the money always like that, but it was definetly worth it too have that good of a time with her...wouldnt change anything that happened yesterday. Stay tuned for more....
i know something you dont know...and kim knows, and crystal knows, and i think hillary knows....:-)

Well it has been a really good two days. I met, and have been getting to know a really cool girl named michelle. I can only say good things about her and hope to get to know her better, and from there, who knows. I'm in a good mood today....got some good pizza too. Thanks Michelle.....more about this later :)

Untitled by Jason Law time to go time to say all the things i've left undone no more time no more ways to let you hear what i need to say Pre-chorus: What do i need to do to make you understand.... Chorus: my new song my new job is it good enough for you my new song my last wrong what else is there to do Never have i, let you down, but thats ok now cause i have moved on and i have lived on without hearing your painful sound i've got more time now i have her now someone new who loves me too you've lost the one thing that'll take you down interlude: over and over you said to me the times we said we always be free now look where we are no what else is there you dont see in this non-apology

New poem/song whichever you want to call it Lifetime by Jason Law lifetimes can pass you by faster than the days go by tender beauty, i'll address life without you, such a mess softer than the pillow feathers your skin, your smell, your getting better every night and day i feel you closer without you i feel under the weather between these lines of love and hate there the dilema begins, i'll state when hate is something absent from us without you i turn to dust to be able to breathe you in and then to see you grin my heart does pull hard next to you i will guard now the days go by with much sorrow to know that one day there will be no tomorrow forever though our hearts will be as we walk together, just you and me

Things seem to be getting better...yes i'm actually saying that, its not the normal stuff you hear me say, but i'm feeling good about certain things. Mostly tomorrow is going to be a good day i hope. Today is ok, not feeling to good, so i didnt go to school...i did email my paper though to my teacher so i hope that'll be ok...she hasnt responded to me about that but ohh well. I have a new outlook on life, and it seems to be working...dont put all your hopes in one area, spread them out and your bound to have more success....so far its working out...peace.

ok...friday went to see the band (willhite) play, i decided that what was happening around me that it was ok to have 5 drinks in less than an hour...i needed it i think. Yesterday... worked the daddy/daughter dance...was pretty cool, at least its better than lifeguarding.

yesterday was a bad day...was just in a bad mood all day. Had to do jury duty in the morning but wasnt picked, but before that i got lost in detroit trying to find the building. Then after i got home, my sister felt like arguing with me, then my parents got home and i got the same thing, so i decided to leave. I usually just do that and drive around anywhere to try and cool off...then michelle called and we were going to hangout, but it was getting late and she was going to go to bed, well i still was in a bad mood and kinda took it out on her a little.....thats not me......i called her right back and apologized, but i never take my bad day out on someone else, and i especially dont want to do that on her. I feel really bad. I went over to hills after that, and just felt shitty about myself, so i had a beer...yeah i know its not the answer, but it felt good. I also havent eaten in 2 days, so it hit me hard...i fell asleep there till 1 then left and went home......i hope today is better....

Never knew it wouldnt take much effort to be happy. I had another great time last night, well the time from around 6-11:30. First of all yesterday was my moms and my grandpa's birthday. My mom turned 48, and my grandpa 80. So we went over to my grandparents house to celebrate their birthdays, and we played some games and ate some food. Now i was going to stay the whole time, but my sister who is evil, had to ruin it for me. She started to say things to me about this girl that i'm seeing, that were not too nice or just didnt make sense. First she asked me if she was black, like that matters...second then she asked me if she was pregnant, which didnt make any sense, then she asked me if she was ugly, and that made me mad. My mom was sitting right there and heard what she was saying and was giving my sister bad looks. Then what made me madder was that she called me a liar. She was trying to make me feel bad or something just to make her feel good, cause when i'm happy about something, she always tries to do that. On top of all that, she asked me if i could give her a ride home HELL NO!!!! I left right then and said goodbye to everyone and wished my mom and grandpa a happy birthday and headed out. Well i had nothing else to do and i wanted to see michelle. So i gave her a call once i got a signal on my cell phone, and she said it was ok for me to come over. I got there around 6, i met her dad who seemed nice, but we didnt really get a chance to talk about anything. Then me and michelle went into the living room and watched tv. At first we were kinda just sitting next to each other but by the end of the night we were cuddling together and holding hands....my hand fell asleep past the point of being asleep, it wasnt even tingling...i didnt care though i was too comfortable and happy just to be lying there with her. I really didnt want to leave, i could of just stayed there on that couch forever and would of been happy...i've never felt so comfortable being around someone like i am with her....it feels good. Well i think i'm going to see her again tonight and then tomorrow night too over at hillarys...i cant wait!!! :) Well stay tuned for much much more!

all i need is sleep...i think i'm getting sick or the flu. i'm at school right now and have another exam today...i think i'll go home after the exam and go to bed...i really dont feel too good, but i have to be ok for tomorrow....working day camp!
ok....did i do something wrong, say something wrong??? I have no idea.....same old things that happened to me before happen again.
mmmm fazoli's....good food, good times, good talks, wish i had more time.
new layout

why is it that being the nice guy always ends up being the worse thing to do??? Girls go for the guy who treats them the worse while the nice guy who cares and repects the girl gets nothing...someone help me to understand this!!!!

hmmm havent typed in this in awhile...nothing new has happened lately...me and michelle are just friends now, thats ok i guess. Whatever she needs to do for herself i'll support that. I'm starting to get a bad cold and that sucks....my spring break is next week. Why does Wayne State have to have everything so messed up??? I need something, or someone i dont know what. Havent been feeling all that great lately, maybe its just the weather cause its fricken -4 degrees outside. Michigan is fucked up!!!

Just reminds me never to get into a knife fight, never know if someone who looks like tommy lee jones could kick your ass. My new motivation! I'm planning on moving out of the house by fall of this year!!!! Anyone want to be my roommate???

If i had more money things would be alot easier...if i was out of college life would be alittle less stressful....if i had a good job i'd have more motivation....to many if's....i think i need to start changing that!

Ohh st. patricks day....had a good time at Baileys Pub (our local hangout). It was packed we were standing for the first hour then we finally got a seat. I only had one beer cause i had only 4 dollars and the beer cost was $3...no specials...:( I hope though that my friends nephew is ok and that they find out whats wrong with him....if you need anything at all, let me know! Well off to lunch now....ohh did ya here? were going to war............................
8 more days till my birthday!

I have no idea if anyone reads what i write. So this is a test....Well i was walking my dog down the street, when all of a sudden my older brother came up to me and asked if i had taken his money. I said no cause i just won the lottery so i didnt know what the hell he was talking about. But because of all of the crazy things that my sister does my brother thought it was me for some reason. I just got my new jet, which i'll use on the weekends, but i really like me audi tt. Well whoever reads this i guess i'll find out.

Thank you everyone who made it out to bw3's tonight...i had a lot of fun. After bw3's me, crystal, and her cousin william went cosmic bowling over at cherry hill lanes, that was fun too and crystal fell. Then after that we made some good phone calls to peoples voicemails....i hope you all like them. well i'm tired from this long day, and i think i'm gonna get some rest. tty all later!

3 more days till my birthday and 1 more day till buffalo wild wings with the friends. I've invited alot of people to go, but the one person that i'd like to go hasnt called me back telling me that she'll be there :( ... I know she's busy and all lately, with the new job and helping out her sister, but if she cant go or if she can i'd wish she call and let me know. Ohh i still dont know if i have the head counselor position yet at work...i was supposed to be contacted yesterday and i wasnt, so maybe today i will know. Hmmm you know what is funny....dancing bananas.

Hey guess what i got in the mail today!!!!!!!! MONEY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Yeah i got 2,645.50 HELL YEAH!!!! Its money that i got from school, cause i didnt go to school in the fall but i did in the winter, so they gave me the money i didnt use for fall and i can do whatever i want with it....of course i'm going to save all of it except i'm using the 645 for bills so 2000 is goin into savings. So i'm not broke anymore!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! but that doesnt mean i'm gonna start buying stupid stuff, i'm done doing that....time to be more responsible with my money, like saving up so i can afford to move out, which looks like it'll be happening more and more each day!

yes it has been awhile since i last posted on here but oh well...I'm waiting to see if i get the head counselor position at work but i dont know if i'll get it. Last night was fun, hung out with the friends with the chimera goin....tons of fun....cant wait till june though....lots of fun. I'm also looking forward to this friday at BW3's. I'll write about everything on here later about that, but now i gots to go.

1. The road represents your attitude towards falling in love. You chose the short road--you fall in love quickly and easily. 2. The number of red roses represents how much you give in a relationship, while the number of white represents what you expect in return. You give 50% and expect 50% in return. 3. This question represents your attitude towards handling relationship problems. You asked the family member to get your significant other--you like to avoid problems and hope that they will solve themselves. 4. The placement of the roses determines how much you like to see your boy/girlfriend. You want to place the roses on the bed--you like to see him/her a lot. 5. This represents your attitude towards his/her personality. You prefer the person to be asleep--you love the person as the way s/he is. 6. The road to home tells how long you stay in love with someone. You chose the longer road--you will tend to stay in love for a long time. That's all folks. Best wishes to those who are in love.

went to a new place last night called sidetracks in depot town. Lots of fun, happy birthday christie! Dont have a lot to write about, cause nothing really big happened this weekend. maybe something exciting and cool will happen soon. I have no idea....just have to wait and see.

yeah ok...so on monday my friend hit my car....and broke the front grill. i'm not really pissed, but i'm also not happy about it. I mean he backed right into it. Well i better be getting a new grill cause its the only car that i've had that looks fairly decent. errrrrrrr

How hard should i be trying??? Should i just leave it alone and let the possiblity of something happening, which never does due to me usually doing that.....or should i keep doing what i'm doing? I'm tired of being left in between the void of knowing what is going on and whats not going on. I feel as if i'm a bit empty sometimes....yes this all sounds very confusing, but i know a few people know what i'm talking about.............. Well i got the head counselor position at work so thats cool....i cant wait for summer to start. I want school to be over right now, i'm done with this stuff.........i just want to move on!!!!!

Hey its my birthday today...actually at 3:30pm it is, but thats not the point...I'm going to bahama breeze for lunch/dinner around 3....It's going to be fun. I'm 22 but i dont feel like it at all. Ok now for something alittle off topic...i dont understand why people call my house at 10:30 at night asking for me, my parents are asleep by then, people need to call my cell so the house phone doesnt wake everyone up. I'm fricken starving right now, but i think i'm going to wait till we go out that way i can eat alot. People give me a call later if you want to do something....i'll probably be over hills later. see ya.
i dont know what's going on right now....i just need some kind of routine i think.

oohhhhhhhh I'm not feeling soo good....i'm not going to classes today cause i feel like shit! I had a good conversation with my friend hillary last night and made me realize some things about myself and my friends, and i feel very lucky to have them. They're almost like family to me, i can talk to them about anything and just be myself. But for the last month or two i havent been feeling all that great. I havent found anything really that keeps my interest, everything is just kinda blah.....i dont know if i'm depressed or what, i probably am....cause i keep everything inside and dont show my feelings or emotions....cause i dont think i need to worry people about things.....i feel as if i'm almost self-destructive.

Ok, i havent posted in here in awhile so i think i'll give it a try....Well this week has been great and not so great... First of all we had mini day camp this last week which was alot of fun to work at. I cant wait till summer starts when the summer day camp starts. The field trips were fun too. Detroit Science Center and Basketron/Lazer Tag. That was the good things about last week...the bad things i found out were that my mom is going to have to get another surgery done to remove some pre-cancerous moles on her back, and my sister got a biopsy done too this week, and my dad went into the doctors and had an xray done on his chest and they found that he has some kind of dark spot on his lungs, which they dont know what it is yet....so this is not good. Not too happy about this, seems like i cant go by one week without having to worry about anything.....i hope this summer is much better.
sorry site was down...all back to normal now
i know now...everything is fine and good.......no worries
new design to the layout of my blog...what does everyone think of it???

Its nice out finally, to the point where you dont have to wear a jacket or layers of clothing. spring is a good time of the year, and its also the time of the year when school gets over with. I'm finally finished with this school year!!! I'm looking forward to work this summer and hopefully finding a full time job by fall to get my own place. Thats the plan!!! Its what i need.

I wish i knew how to make life less stressfull for everyone i know. I dont know what i can do for them or what i try to do is helping. Got to have a postive attitude about things and life in general. Dont let things that are little get to you. Like things that are not going to change you the rest of your life but may upset your weekend. I dont know why some people are so ignorant about this, but others do have definite stress and problems, those people i'll give my most attention and concern too, cause i cant stretch myself too thin, like i've done in the past.

tuesday was a great day went out to the park with michelle and had some ice cream. But then after that i had to work, which wasnt that great, but the beginning of the day made up for that. Thats about it for today...i dont have anything that exciting to say today...maybe later though

calm comes after the storm daylight breaks the clouds that rained before tension released and pressure subsided all that was left before is washed away with a new feeling of happiness and joy calm comes after the storm wonder where it was all before nothing less but more unknown what comes next is a little more than before things are better now when the calm comes after the storm

Ok...so this weekend is boring, all i've done is work and be lazy sitting at home. But i havent really been at home that much lately. Half of my friends (the ones who are girls) went to Chicago this weekend, i got a call from them today and they said that their having a great time....i think its time i go on a vacation too....but i want to go camping somewhere. I havent gone in a long time and i love to be outdoors...i want to take my mountain bike with me too, and do some trail riding, that'd be fun...but i know it wont be this week, maybe next week i'll go.

wow, i've havent felt so sick like this in awhile. coughing, nose running, sore throat. It sucks! Plus going to the club last night didnt make things any better, that was a dumb thing to do, since i didnt get home till 4 in the morning!!!!!!!! I'm not smart, not thinking. I had fun, kinda last night just wasnt really into dancing then my knee started to hurt which wasnt cool at all. I was supposed to hang out with michelle yesterday but that didnt happen, was a little dissapointed that we didnt get to see each other, but things happen and plans change, i'll probably talk to her tomorrow. I missed work this morning also cause i had no voice at all and to teach swim lessons on saturday mornings you need to have a voice, well mine was cracking and i couldnt talk louder than a normal inside voice, so i couldnt make it in. So i went back to sleep and didnt wake up till 4, i'm feeling a little bit better now but thats only because of the medication. well thats all for now, there'll be plenty more for later.
well its been quite awhile since i last posted in this. nothing new or exciting has happened lately.

ok, last night was alot of fun. Had a little party over at hill's house and it was pretty good...didnt get sick, no hang-over and the night had very little drama/fights going on (i guess). Plus i can remember everything that happened last night so no blacking out. I also got to know a person alittle bit better last night too...which i'll go into detail later....

Work, work, and more work...that seems to be all that i've been able to think about for the last week or two...well not the only thing, and nothing really is going on with that. I'm ready to be in a long-term steady relationship...have been for awhile, the waiting game isnt fun...but when i like someone i try to keep my attention on them and no other person who i may like......its weird...i know..........My neck is killing me right now, i hate getting stiff necks!!!!!!!!!

Last night was alot of fun! Drove out to jackson to see a friends band play at some small garage/bar place...where the hicks live. Well the trip there and home was more fun than being there and watching them play. Although i need to get a new pair of sunglasses, but all in all it was a good time. NEED TO GO BACK AND GET A PICTURE WITH THE LHAMA!!

what can i say? not much. Its been a pretty stressful week. Alot of work and planning has been done for this summer at work. Things being done at the last minute, and things being thrown to the side. I like being busy, but i just hope that with all of the work that we've done that it actually comes out good. My boss hasnt even told us that we've done a good job, so it sometimes seems that we're doing alot of work and that no one notices. I dont know....

AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH.........i dont understand girls at all, they say one thing then do another. When someone who once was with someone and they decided a long time ago that being together would never work, then they move in together into an apartment, and they still say their just friends....then you say something like "at least i dont have an alcoholic boyfriend" which i guess she just slipped and said, so i asked her if she and her friend are still just friends..................long pause...................... "well when alcohol is involved alot of things you may not want to say are said" then she doesnt want to talk to me about what that means right now..................ARGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGG.............why cant i just find someone who i can understand???? I always find the ones who are confusing to figure out and never give you a clear understanding of where you stand in a relationship. i dont think there's anything wrong with me at all!!!!! I've given her all the respect that i could possible give, i just dont understand what else i can do. Seriously..............some people just dont make any sense!!! Be honest with me cause thats how i am, i never lie to anyone about anything just let me know what is up and i'm fine, but say your doing one thing and then do another, i dont know what to say to that! ...........very confused!

Well what an interesting week it has been, since my parents have been out of town for a week now. Had a party which was fun and been pretty busy with work. Been thinking about a lot of things lately, about friends, relationships, life, work and everything else.....i love the friends i have, i'm ready to be in a long term relationship, i'm happy where i am in life right now and work is keeping me busy. Not too much more to say than that, nothing to complain about really.......just ready to move onto the next step in life.

can i go through one week without hearing any kind of bad news??? Now i found out that my dad went in to have a biopsy done on something in his thyroid and its being sent to stanford university to be checked out cause it has abnormal cells in it. It could be thyroid cancer.....he may have to have kemo done after they do surgery to remove one of his thyroids then after that i dont know what else their gonna do....this is scaring me cause first i find out my biological grandfather has a cancer/tumor in his heart and is dying and now my father may have thyroid cancer...my grandfather is on my moms side though, and he has diabetes too, so it runs on my moms side of the family for heart disease and diabetes and also on my fathers side....its been on my mind alot and i dont know whats gonna happen, and my father really doesnt talk that much about his health condition cause he likes to think that he's really healthy...so i find these things out days later after he knows about it......i just dont know what to do right now....its frustrating and stressing and scary.

well its been a little while since i've last posted...things have happened since then. My mom's dad and my biological grandfather is not doing so good, he has a heart tumor and only has 4-6 weeks left to live. The thing is i'm confused about how to feel, i mean i never really met the guy or considered him my grandfather cause he never really tried to be my grandfather. I guess i shouldnt really feel like i'm missing anything cause i do have a grandfather who i love which i've known my whole life. So i guess i'm the one who isnt missing out on knowing him, he's missing out on knowing me.

fucking great news!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I GOT THE JOB!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! $14/hr for 3-4 weeks then if they hire me its 25,000/yr!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! with benefits!!!!!!!! Nothing bets better than that!

Long time nothing written...havent had the time, or the motivation to write in here. Just dont want to sometimes...but i have good news!!!! I'm sending in my application for an apartment today!!!!!!!!!!!! Hopefully it gets approved and then i can move out!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! It'll be great to be out on my own, i'm movin out with my friend brian. What we found is at Harbor Club in Belleville. $620 a month but you have to pay electric and water, which sucks, but its still cheaper than anywhere else we have found. It's a 2 bedroom/bath apartment with washer/dryer, dishwasher and everything...pretty cool. Another topic........ I'm giving up on trying to see a certain person due to the realization that i've come to is that she is way to immature. This is the 3rd time we've made plans to do something and that it hasnt happened. The day we are supposed to do something she wont be able to be reached by phone or anything, she just disappears, and then you cant even get a hold of her afterwards to find out what happened. Today is wednesday, and our date was for sunday...havent heard shit. What is with people??? no respect, i just cant trust cetain people i guess. Only close friends right now i guess....other than that, there's no one....kinda depressing actually. well.................... TILL LATER!!!!!!!!!

everything is packed and ready to go...seems so empty with only the bed in the room. But tomorrow is gonna be a busy day. Signing the lease, moving stuff in...getting my "new" bed in, putting everything together....its going to be fun. cant wait. most of my friends are gonna help me move too, which i appreciate cause i'm gonna need all the help that i can get. Well this may be the last post for awhile till i get access to the internet...wait i said that last post...i guess i lied....well till later!

Only 1 more day to get through then i move into my apartment! It'll be nice to get out. Ok i've come to realize that people in livonia dont know how to drive. 6 mile was full of idiots who dont look when they drive and they think that going 50 during rush hour is going to solve anything...i dont think so. I figure that once i move into my apartment i'll have many, many, many stories to tell you all. But untill then i've got pretty much nothing...i'm ready for new experiences and basically a new life. Keeping the friends...just new location. It may be awhile till i have access to the internet at my apartment, have to figure out how were gonna deal with that. Well till later!

First day at the job! 7:40am : went to the wrong building 7:50am : found the right building 8:00am : introduced to everyone (youngest there) 8:15am : told what my job is ... blah blah blah 8:40am : standing watching some guy fix my computer 9:00am : still standing 9:30am : start to actually work...redesigning ferbermidwest.com website 12:00pm : lunch 1:00pm : back from lunch 2:00pm : bored 3:30pm : basically done with work 5:00pm : leave work thats how it went....the adventure continues tomorrow.

urlLink TheSpark.com's The Date Test : "Damn, Rico! You are... 87% dateable! Attractive and confident, witty and charming, a healthy ambrosia-based diet... you're wanted in the 48 contiguous states, you slayer. Call me. Seduce me. Make me a woman (or man.) Not only do you know how to turn a girl's (or guy's) engines on, but you also know how to oil, lube and rotate it. You put the 'elation' back into 'relationship,' and the 'night' back into 'one-night stand.' "

Well internet is finally up and running in The 308 APT. Also have cable now!!!! No more dvd movies for awhile, cause that's all that we have been watching all week. Tonight were having a stock party...its gonna be fun! Hopefully no one gets sick. Were getting two more couches next week...so that means the futon goes out onto the balcony. So we'll have 3 couches total...way cool, more room for people to sit...which is always a good thing. Well i'll write more about the party tomorrow, after i've done recovering... peace.

Remember this list? 1. Work a shit load of hours this summer 2. Spend money on things i really need not want 3. Find a roommate who is responsible 4. Find an apartment 5. Get funiture 6. Move into apartment 7. Be happy for once in my life Lets see if i did it... 1. did work alot this summer 2. didnt buy stupid shit 3. found a roommate 4. got an apartment 5. i have furniture 6. moved into the apartment last week 7. pretty damn happy Well i did it...ohh i get cable and internet today at the apartment!!! well till later.

Well tonight was alot of fun! Went out and actually did somethings. First of all i went to go and see the movie Underworld with my friend urlLink Kimi . Great movie, i recommend everyone to see it! Then after the movie we went up to Baileys our normal hang out spot and had a couple of drinks. Met our friend jenn up there too who i havent had a chance to see in awhile and catch up on things. It was nice. Ohhh my friend urlLink Sara who works up there at Baileys had her hair dyed, and it looks good! I like it alot. After Baileys me and kim went back to her house and just watch some stupid tv show hosted by Carmen Electra on Tv Commercials. I hate shows like this where they try to be funny and its really fake and annoying. Tomorrow we get two new couches!!! Futon is goin on the balcony. Everyone is welcomed to come and help out! k...thats all for now, peace out!
Here is what i'm working on at work. Its a redesign for the urlLink Masco site. They're site is pretty fugly right now, so i'm making it look 100 times better. What do you all think???
added the tag board

I feel so tired right now....but its ok. Well lets see, the plan for tonight is to go and see michelle's apartment tonight, if that really happens, we'll just have to wait and see. I dont think i'm going to make a lunch tonight for work tomorrow, i'll go out and buy a lunch i guess. Its just that the traffic in Livonia (6, 7, 8 mile/haggerty) is really bad. My job is interviewing a new developer tomorrow morning. Hope he's cool like all the other people working right now, and not some asshole loser. Well i finally made a design for the Masco site that my boss liked. Only took 4 designs. Its a pretty cool design, one of my best, but the others were pretty damn good too. My boss is just really picky. I actually though had to go to lunch early cause they didnt have anything else for me to do, untill i came back from lunch. Web Design can get boring after awhile, but when someone tells you that they like your design alot, it makes you more motivated. I think i'm gonna add some interactive stuff on my blog...just have to go and find the stuff, dont know what i want to put up yet though....hmmmm...well that's all for now... peace!

So at my job today they put me on their timesheet manager...which means basically that i'm hired!!!! Yeah i know, i rock! Other than that....have you ever had one of those mornings where you just dont want to wake up???????? I had one today...i was sooo comfortable in bed, i had thoughts of calling in sick or something or just showing up late and blaming it on the traffic. But i got up, i love my job....just that the bed felt sooo nice this morning. I have to get my bathroom sink fixed, thats on the to-do list. For some reason the pipes and water pressure seem to get the need to push stuff back up the pipes and into my sink!!! It makes it smell like sewer, i think i need some liquid plumber or drano or something. whatever it is, dont like it! Looks all black and shit when it comes out....so i have to keep my bathroom door shut then, cause the smell gets tooo bad. Well i have plenty more to say, but i'll save it untill later....peace

Last night was the party to start it all!!! Had a stock the bar party, and everyone showed up. It was tons of fun. Played darts, euchre, poker, laughed, and consoled friends who were praying to the porcelain shrine . I was even surprised that Michelle did show up. Well she said she would but she got there around 1 or so ( yeah i know i havent talked about her in awhile, but...ya know ). I got to show her my place and everything. But mostly we were helping her sis my best friend kimi with what she was needing to do ( you know what i'm talking about ). I think i'm gonna change the layout of my blog...something that has to do with the apartment now. Well that'll happen later. peace

Well...since its been awhile since i've posted (from what i've been told) I'll give you a little something. I recieved my first check in the mail yesterday from work...$1120.00 ....very nice...i'll be getting around 900 or so i believe once i'm an actual "employee" of ZenaComp. But before that happens i'll be getting another check around the same amount soon. What's with the weather??? Had to go an buy a fleece jacket yesterday cause i had nothing that was semi-warm/fall jacket. So made a trip up to meijer again. Yes i saw michelle there, we talked on her break. Nothing else happened....she still is saying that she wants me to see her place, but somehow plans always fall through. Ok...back to other more important stuff! I'm pissed! My bathroom sink still is not fixed!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! The maintence guy is supposedly coming out today to fix it, but originally wasnt going to come out till monday, asshole, fuckers, WHORES! It smells like shit, i dont even want to use it, let alone if someone was to visit and use the bathroom i dont want them even near it. Assholes!

Lets call this weekend, the weekend that was full and fast. Thats basically how to describe it. Yesterday didnt do much till later in the night when me, kim, hill, mike and eric went to pinball petes. Always fun, got about 720 tickets. Then stayed over at kims, cause today we went to the Renaissance Festival. Me and hill, went last year and it was alot of fun. This time we brought kim who popped her renaissance virgin cherry. Wasnt too painfull now was it? Well thats all i did this weekend and it went by fast. Now i'm just doing laundry for this week. Well that's all...till later!

What to say about this weekend so far...lots of fun?? Yeah...went to Club Divine last night...was alot of fun, went with kim, hillary, crystal and christie...yeah i was the only guy there...but hey, those are good odds. Didnt get back to the apt till 3 am. Today i went to Christies, daughters b-day party. She just turned 5. She's a really cool kid. I got her a fusion bead craft set. We went to Ceaserland for her birthday. It was alot of fun. Tomorrow i'm bringing my cat here to the apt where she'll stay from now on. Not going to pay the deposit yet untill i have to, and if they see it i'll just say that i was watching it for a friend. That'll work, right??? Well hopefully.

WTF!!!! Ok...listen here...you make plans you keep them....you dont make other plans on top of the original ones!!!! Why cant i just find a normal girl??? She said she'd call if plans changed...that was at 5:30 well its now 10:40...i'm not too happy! When i make plans i keep them and i dont let them get broken by anything else, unless there was an emergency, which i dont think there is in this case. So if your a normal, regular girl...talk to me, if not i dont want to hear it!

Today is my first official day as a ZenaComp employee! Signed all the papers and everything. Which took quite awhile. Other than doing that i didnt do too much today, except i went to lunch with kim and christie. It's been pretty quiet around here...no parties or anything. Kinda nice actually. i'm sorry to say though i dont have that much to write today...maybe tomorrow...or soon...we'll see. peace!
ummm i dont know what to write...dont have any motivation right now...bad week.

hmmm its sweetest day...those days for people who have someone to share it with...for the rest of us....just another day.

Well what an interesting week this has been!! Halloween is around the corner and i'm having a PaRtY!!! Call if your coming! If not come anyways. Everyone is wearing a costume, i have mine going with the old scream costume... :-) Yeah i know its boring, but just wait!!! I think its all funny, i try scaring them before they scare me....well that's all till...later

Well i finally got my web cam to work!!!!!!!!!!!!! only took about 1 year...hehe...but really it works now. It can be viewed using windows media player now too. Had to uninstall my network adapter and then reinstall it...never would of guessed that it would work...well thats all for now.

So...where are you gonna be this 31st of October? Hopefully your gonna be where the fun is at. Where the party is. That place you've been hearing so many things about. You know where it is. Its Apt 308. Things will happen that havent happened before and a surprise that know one knows about will be revealed. Ask all you want, you just have to wait. Look forward to the photos from the party coming next week! Later!!!

Well its friday, and i suppose i should be out doing something tonight, but no one is around.....another uneventful friday night. Tomorrow i'm going to lunch with my parents and returning some stuff and picking up any mail....other than that i dont have any other plans. Maybe a road trip somewhere...hehe...i wish.
does it really matter? that is the question of the day.

Welllllllll...since everyone thinks i should do another post, i will. Whats new? ummm not a whole lot. I finding out more and more that I'm getting older and wanting less and less to be involved in childish highschool arguments and discussions. I've been ready to just move on past adolesence and into adulthood for a long time, but some people in my life just feel that having drama and being an ass is always a good thing to be. You dont have to be right all the time! Well now thats off my chest maybe i can be more positive. I went out and bought xbox yesterday.... been playin Simpson Hit and Run all day. its alot of fun. I want to get halo and some other games but i'll have to wait on that. Its already a week into november....time is goin by pretty fast it seems. 2 weeks is thanksgiving, and i have no idea what i'm doing...i think i'm going to go to my grandparents house our maybe at my parents, dont really know. I think this is pretty good for now. Havent really had a chance to post that much with working and stuff.....but this is for you who requested and you shall receive...umm yeah. later!

damn missed a day....well this week sure went by fast. but hopefully this weekend doesnt. Laundry day...yeah it sucks but needs to be done...i feel like i'm in such a routine...work monday thru friday, usually hang with someone on friday night..saturday see the parents and sunday spend all day doing laundry....repeat.... I need something more i think, dont know what but something...i like being spontenous (sic?). but just havent felt like i've had the motivation to or the time. Its always different seeing my grandparents on my moms side. My grandpa always talks about money and my grandma really doesnt say too much to me. I hate the fact that they point things out to me...like i'm trying to lose some weight (15 lbs) and my grandpa says "hey looks like you put on some weight...looks good on ya" what can i say to that??? thanks alot, i'm actually trying to lose some weight and they keep telling me to eat more and to put on some weight...i dont know...its just annoying.
Happy Thanksgiving!!!

Posting a song that i wrote about a year ago....dont have a name for it...but its mine.. Writer: Jason Law Date: 2/13/03 Song Title: Untitled Verse 1 Wont you tell me that you wanna try something more than this cause just last night i was dreaming cant get you out of my head (go to pre-chorus) Verse 2 Left you there and i know this Felt it once so now i'm cold Its in my mind past the right time i'm left with nothing more (pre-chorus) and... Dont you understand that everytime i see you there cause i cant stand we all know it'll never end yeah yeah yeah yeah Chorus Complicated, yeah i know it seems so messed Inspirated, you send it right through my head (Second time go to Verse 3) No more now, its easier now your comin back to me again... (repeat pre-chorus, chorus 1x) Verse 3 Wicked thoughts, thinner lots they run right through my head Someday when i'll see you there hold you close to stay awake (go to pre-chorus, go to chorus 1x then go to interlude) Interlude When all they say, is that it'll be ok When whats left to say is that i'll stay yeah yeah yeah (go to pre-chorus, go through chorus 2x then end)

I won't worry my life away. I won't worry my life away. It is a dangerous liaison I say the comedy is that its serious. Which is a strange enough new play on words I say the tragedy is how you're gonna spend the rest of your nights with the light on So shine the light on all of your friends because it all amounts to nothing in the end. I won't worry my life away. I wo'nt worry my life away. When I fall in love I take my time There's no need to hurry when I'm making up my mind You can turn off the sun but I'm still gonna shine and I'll tell you why Because the remedy is the experience. It is a dangerous liaison I say the comedy is that its serious. Which is a strange enough new play on words I say the tragedy is how you're gonna spend the rest of your nights with the light on So shine the light on all of your friends because it all amounts to nothing in the end. I won't worry my life away. I won't worry my life away. I won't and I won't and I won't etc.

rainy weekends...i do hate them. It better be nice out tomorrow but i have a feeling that its just going to rain all day. What have i been doing lately you might be asking yourself?? Well not a whole lot...i have been pretty busy with work, which i'm doing pretty good at right now. I'm taking on more of the role of web designer/web developer. My main title is graphic artist which really isnt the right title cause we do web work...but anyways i hope that all my extra work will pay off when it comes time to getting my yearly review...i have already been awarded for my hard work...my boss last week gave me $250 in Best Buy gift cards!!! Its pretty sweet...20gb of space, can connect to my home network, have a in car player for it too...i use it all the time....well i think i have been rambling on enough...ohh i'm thinking about getting a tattoo...dont know of what yet though...my friend sara just started working at eternal so maybe i'll have to go and visit her there too when i eventually decide on what i want to get....well ok..this is it...later.

hehe...nothing like a good title huh? Well so it seems that things are finally getting back to normal...although i have a feeling things are going to be turned upside down and become much more complicated. But isnt that what life is supposed to be about? That if it was easy, what is the point??? Well june went by pretty damn fast. fuck...i need to get out of this routine with just work and then go home and be too tired to do anything...i think i'm gonna go to the pool tomorrow and relax...that'd be nice. yeah...

So i went to work today...yeah i worked on saturday, usually a day when i sleep in till 11 and spend most of the day playin video games or hangin with friends, i spent at work. They better appreciate my dedication...yeah...thats right..

why does everything right now seem so routine??? seems as if there is nothing sponteneous anymore. everything is planned and accounted for. nothing is done at the last moment or when you feel like doing it. You have to have plans to be doing something, you cant just go because you have no reason to. Seems like thats just something that is always going to be...sucks though if you think about it...cause every day you do the same thing...nothing really exciting really ever happens...for me its wake up, shower, get dressed and go to work, come home, try to eat something, make lunch go to bed....fucking routines...sucks

let me just start and say VERIZON WIRELESS SUCKS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I cant stop service untill july 29 now......i hate them...they have shitty service and my phone dies all the time................i'm pissed

So this last thursday was an interesting night. Alot of fun but interesting. We all decided that we go out to the club to go and celebrate mikes birthday, which is cool and all since i dont know what he's actually doing today since today is his real birthday, but anyways...we get to the club and as usual nobody is dancing or doing anything...everyone there is standing around the floor talking or just waiting for something to happen...usually it seems people have to have enough alcohol in their system before they get enough balls to actually get onto the floor and start dancing....so basically were the first ones to actual go onto the floor and start dancing, and just like every time people then follow our lead.....yeah thats right we start the party all the time....as the night goes on were all having fun, dancing, drinking, and other stuff, well i looked over to my left and noticed this small circle forming in the crowd...now i didnt know what was going on so i decided to find out what was going on...i just encountered my first dance off...it has to be the weirdest thing you could ever see...its like a fight where you throw dance moves instead of punches...seriously looks really stupid....kinda like someone was watching too much of that Wade Robinson Project show on MTV too much, or You Got Served...either way it was pretty funny to watch. All in all it was a fun night....cept when i had to wake up at 7 the next morning for work.

ever had that feeling to find out whats around you that you've been too busy to look for? or when that something has been right in front of you the whole time and you cant do a damn thing about it....yeah, thats where i am.

this means alot right now... There's a place off Ocean Avenue Where I used to sit and talk with you We were both 16 and it felt so right Sleeping all day, staying up all night Staying up all night There's a place on the corner of Cherry Street We would walk on the beach in our bare feet We were both 18 and it felt so right Sleeping all day, staying up all night Staying up all night If I could find you now things would get better We could leave this town and run forever Let your waves crash down on me and take me away There's a piece of you that's here with me It's everywhere I go, it's everything I see When I sleep, I dream and it gets me by I can make believe that you're here tonight That you're here tonight If I could find you now things would get better We could leave this town and run forever I know somewhere, somehow we'll be together Let your waves crash down on me and take me away I remember the look in your eyes When I told you that this was goodbye You were begging me not tonight Not here, not now We're looking up at the same night sky And keep pretending the sun will not rise We'll be together for one more night Somewhere, somehow If I could find you now things would get better We could leave this town and run forever I know somewhere, somehow we'll be together Let your waves crash down on me and take me away

so the past week or so, i havent felt like getting out and doing anything...no motivation to get out, do anything...just havent been in the mood. Its been work, sleep, eat (sometimes) and sleep...repeat.... and i'm trying to get out and do something...so if anyone is interested..let me know....i'm ready.

I hate days when i have nothing to do at work...instead of designing something or working on a project i sit there staring at my computer screen, thinking that something important will come by, and then nothing does...this happens alot...give me something to do and i'll be happy, as long as its not just busy work...fuck if its just busy work thats not what i'm there to do...

Ok, now i know alot of you have gone to the movies and encountered those people that find everything that is said freakin hilarious...right??? They annoy the hell out of you and even make you kinda embarrased because it seems so stupid for them to be laughing at something that is not that funny in the first place. Your probably wondering what i'm talking about if you have no idea right now, but i went to see "Harold and Kumar go to White Castle" with kim today and there were about 3 of these types of people. They laughed at basically everything that was said...cant just help to want to throw something at their head and have it hopefully lodge into they're mouth so they can not talk....its just really annoying...
